basic-63b58d6a92.description: Given the uniqueness requirements above serial numbers can be expected to contain long integers. Certificate users MUST be able to handle serialNumber values up to 20 octets. Conforming CAs MUST NOT use serialNumber values longer than 20 octets.

basic-d2c3455637.description: The serial number MUST be a positive integer assigned by the CA to each certificate. [...] Note: Non-conforming CAs may issue certificates with serial numbers that are negative or zero. Certificate users SHOULD be prepared to gracefully handle such certificates.

common-f4db514b76.description: This test performs no modifications and MUST always pass. If it does not it is an indication that the feature extraction is broken.

weakcrypto-5521f8be14.description: This test checks whether weak key lengths are supported. In this case RSA 512 bit.

weakcrypto-fa9ccc9dfa.description: This test checks whether weak hash algorithms are supported. In this case MD4.

weakcrypto-dbc5ebe60a.description: This test checks whether weak hash algorithms are supported. In this case SHA1.
